name: Break (Cowgummiboy, JamiesBond007, Timbaleek, patrickematik)
description:
In this Game you take breakes and with the help of the menu Buttons try to find a way through the level.

Controlls:

Walk Lef/Right: A/D

Jump: W

Pause/"Break": Space

Move Buttons: Drag and Drop

You can move with WASD to find the END Button. To bridge unreachable gaps, you can use the buttons from the break menu, which you can reach by pressing space. While in a break, you can press and move buttons, but you cannot move. Your breaks are limited, as you can see in the top right corner. If you ran out of pauses, you can restart with 'R'. Have fun puzzling through the levels and reach the end.
To reset your progress, press the "New Game" button in the main menu.

This is a game made for the MiniJam 87 the theme was Break and the limitation "the Player is a pacifist"
